code: import axios from"axios";import{toast}from"react-toastify";axios.defaults.headers.post["Content-Type"]="application/json";axios.interceptors.response.use(null,function(error){var expectedErrors=error.response&&error.response.status>=400&&error.response.status<500;if(!expectedErrors){console.log(error);toast.error("مشکلی از سمت سرور رخ داده است.",{position:"top-right",closeOnClick:true});}return Promise.reject(error);});export default{get:axios.get,post:axios.post,put:axios.put,delete:axios.delete};
